author: Staff Reporter
text:
Members of Arulmighu Veerasakkadevi Amman Temple committee here were happy as Chief Minister Jayalalithaa had announced that the State government would celebrate the function of Mannar Thirumalai Nayakkar, who ruled Madurai in the seventeenth century.

Ancestral deity

M. Muruga Boopathy, president, thanked the Chief Minister. Arulmighu Veerasakkadevi Amman was the ancestral deity of legendary freedom fighter, Veerapandiya Kattabomman.

The temple named after the deity is located at Panchalankurichi, the birth place of the freedom fighter.
title: Committee happy over CM’s announcement
